data.title: Policy and other guidance
data.meta_description: Policy statements and interpretive rules that provide guidance on certain campaign finance law topics to federal campaigns, political committees and individuals, including proposals and requests for comment when made available. Guidance in other formats, such as selected press releases. Internal rules and FEC procedures for handling compliance matters and enforcement cases.
data.text:
Beyond regulations and advisory opinions, the Commission issues policy statements and interpretive rules when necessary to provide additional guidance on certain campaign finance law topics to federal campaigns, political committees, and individuals. The Commission sometimes seeks public comments on these proposed guidance documents before finalizing them.

The Commission also occasionally provides guidance in other formats, such as selected press releases. Additionally, the Commission has adopted internal rules and procedures for handling compliance, enforcement and other cases.
